1: <pb/><t>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová! <pb/>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Cham tac'al bay canil satcan!</t>
2: <t>Alek watx' k'anej, masanil ex yángel Cham. Alek watx' k'anej, masanil ex soldadoal satcan.</t>
3: <t>Ilayokab can Jehová yuj c'u, c'al yuj xajaw. Ilayokab can Cham yuj puj watx' yak'on is k'ak'al.</t>
4: <t>Ilayokab can Cham yuj satcan, tol cantac'al ay, c'apax yuj a' aej ay ajtok yiban satcan.</t>
5: <pb/><t>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová, yujtol a Cham max aloni, cax max esnelay aj masanil!</t>
6: <t>A Cham max watx'nen oc masanil juntzan tu' bay ayic'ok yet watx' ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, cax max yaon oc leyalil tol c'am bak'in chi q'uexlayi.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Yalokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová masanil tzet yetal ay sat tx'otx', no mimek no' ay yul a' mar, c'al no' bay najatil yich a',</t>
8: <t>yetok rayo, sakbat, sakbacom, ak'bal asun, cakxuchum tol yikem bay k'anej Cham.</t>
9: <t>Yalokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová mimek witz, tzalanlak, yetok te satnomtelak, c'al te c'ute',</t>
10: <t>yetok no xolakteal no', c'al no jobbejal no', no' chi jutxtok ba, c'al no tz'iquin.</t>
11: <t>Alek watx' k'anej ex reyalil yulyibank'inal ti', c'al ex conoblak, c'al e masanil ex yajaw, c'al ex juezal conob,</t>
12: <t>ex winak, c'al ex ix, ex icham anima, c'al ex unin.</t>
13: <pb/><t>Alek watx' k'anej bay Jehová e masanil, yujtol asan Cham yelxac'al mimanbil. A is yikbej, ayajtok tac'al yibantok satcan, c'al yiban tx'otx' tx'otx' ti'.</t>
14: <t>A Cham max ak'on jun co Reyal miman yipalil. <pb/>¡Jalokab watx' k'anej bay Cham, ayon Israel on is conob on ti', tol ayon ec' is cawilal! <pb/>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová!</t>
